text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump So ALL 3 doctors/scientists said COVID-19 IS coming back in the fall...then trump the FAILURE contradicts them in real time. He fired Dr. Rick Bright for not touting hydroxychloroquine for him. HE WAS THE ONE TASKED WITH FINDING US A VACCINE... R U KIDDING ME!!.....WAKE UP GOP!!!
